data.name: TargetAPI_Tooltip
data.value: Select the rendering API that the game uses. If you are unsure, check the API section of the game's PCGamingWiki page.

data.name: Update_Tooltip
data.value: Globally update your ReShade DLL files to the latest version.

data.name: ContextMenuDeploy_Tooltip
data.value: Add a 'Deploy ReShade' option to the exe context (right-click) menu.

data.name: Vulkan_Tooltip
data.value:
Creates no DLL.
Requires that you have installed ReShade for Vulkan globally through the official installer.

data.name: Vulkan_Info
data.value: If you haven't already, install ReShade for Vulkan globally through the official ReShade installer. This program will setup the rest.

data.name: Addon_Tooltip
data.value:
Enable this if you plan to install a ReShade add-on to the game.
Warning: Intended for singleplayer games only and may cause bans in multiplayer games.

data.name: DeployButton_Tooltip
data.value: Pick the game exe you want to deploy ReShade to. Make sure you have picked the correct Target API above first. If you are unsure, check the API section of the game's PCGamingWiki page.

data.name: DeployButton_Targeted_Tooltip
data.value: Make sure you have picked the correct Target API above first. If you are unsure, check the API section of the game's PCGamingWiki page.

data.name: FirstTimeSetup
data.value:
ReShade Deployer will now download ReShade and set up the required folder structure into the current folder.
This includes the Shaders and Textures folders, where you will place your shader and texture files.
If you wish to keep these files elsewhere, press 'Exit' and move the program first.

data.name: PresetOverwrite
data.value:
ReShadePreset.ini already exists.
Would you like to overwrite it?

data.name: ConnectionError
data.value: ReShade website (https://reshade.me) is down or the connection was blocked.

data.name: UpdateError
data.value: You are already on the latest version.

data.name: DownloadError
data.value: Failed to access '{0}'. Please report to the developer.

data.name: AccessError
data.value: Extraction failed because write-access was denied. Exit all other programs that use ReShade and try again.
